thread.title: Crocktober Recipes

author: cbs8
title: Crocktober Recipes
text:
Crock-Pot Cheesy Potatoes
submitted by Shirley Johnson from Parsons, KS
2lbs frozen hash browns
1/2 cup melted butter
1/2 lb shredded cheese (we doubled it)
onion
1 can cream of chicken soup
16 oz sour cream
1/3 cup milk
1 tsp salt
Combine all ingredients into slow cooker and cook 2 1/2-3 hours on high.
Italian Beef Sandwiches
submitted by Leona Trotnic from Oswego, KS
3 lb. rump or chuck roast
1 envelope Italian mix
1 t. oregano
1 t. basil
1 t. red pepper flakes
1 t. dried parsley
1 lg. garlic clove, smashed
¾ c. beef broth
*Combine spices and broth
*Pour over roast
*Cook on high 6-8 hrs. or until meat is tender (depending on crockpot)
*Shred meat & let simmer for another 10-15 minutes
*Serve on Italian rolls
(great topped with provolone or mozzarella cheese and banana peppers)
